Had the government of Saddam Hussein remained in power the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today, Donald Rumsfeld wrote in his 800-page memoir, scheduled for release on Tuesday. HP's revelation came the same day that another technology heavyweight, Google Inc., disclosed a surprise reshuffling of its own: CEO Eric Schmidt is relinquishing the job to Google co-founder Larry Page .
